sen.j: 斎藤 利行（さいとう としゆき、1822年2月2日（文政5年1月11日 (旧暦)）- 1881年（明治14年）5月26日）は、幕末の土佐藩家老。
sen.e: Toshiyuki SAITOU (February 2, 1822 - May 26, 1881) was Karo (chief retainer) of Tosa Domain in the end of Edo Period.

sen.j: 明治政府に出仕して刑部大輔・参議・元老院議官を務めた。
sen.e: He worked for the Meiji government as Gyobu no taifu (Senior Assistant Minister of Justice), Sangi (Councillor), and Genroin gikan (Councilor of Chamber of Elders or Senate).

sen.j: 旧名は渡辺 弥久馬（わたなべ やくま）。

sen.j: 同藩士・斎藤利成の子。
sen.e: He was a child of Toshiyuki SAITOU, a feudal retainer of Tosa Domain.

sen.j: 若くして藩主山内豊煕の御側物頭として仕えるが、おこぜ組に加わったことから1843年（天保14年）に反対派によって失脚させられる。
sen.e: He served Toyoteru YAMAUCHI, the lord of domain, as Monogashira (Military Commander) from a young age; however, because he joined Okozegumi, he was ousted by his opponents in 1843.

sen.j: 後に吉田東洋の命によって復職し、近習目付、上士銃隊総練教授などを歴任した。
sen.e: Later, he returned to his old position by the order of Toyo YOSHIDA, and held various posts such as Kinju (attendant), Metsuke (inspector of foot soldiers), and an instructor overseeing a training of Joshi (superior warrior) musket unit.

sen.j: その後、慶応年間には仕置役・家老となる。
sen.e: He worked as Shiokiyaku (a councilor of shogunate) and Karo during the Keio era after these posts.

sen.j: 1867年（慶応3年）に長崎市で起きた土佐藩士によるイギリス水兵殺害事件では、後藤象二郎とともにイギリス公使ハリー・パークスと交渉して補償問題を解決した。
sen.e: He together with Shojiro GOTO negotiated successfully with Harry Parks, a minister of England, and solved the compensation problem when a feudal retainer of Tosa Domain killed a British sailor in Nagasaki City in 1867.

sen.e: In addition, he and Takayuki SASAKI had a great success in obtaining weapons working with Ryoma SAKAMOTO.

sen.e: He changed his name to "Toshiyuki SAITOU" after Meiji Restoration and served for the new government.

sen.j: 1870年（明治3年）には刑部大輔となり、続いて参議として明治政府の中枢に経ち新律綱領編纂にあたた。
sen.e: He was assigned to Gyobu no taifu (Senior Assistant Minister of Justice) in 1870; subsequently he became a core member of the Meiji Government as Sangi (Councillor) and drafted Shinritsu koryo (Outline of the New Criminal Code).

sen.j: 翌年西郷隆盛と木戸孝允の対立から全参議が辞任することになり斎藤もこれに従った。
sen.e: In the following year, all Sangis (Councilors) resigned over the confrontation between Takayoshi KIDO and Takamori SAIGO and SAITOU followed others.

sen.e: He had returned to his hometown in Kochi Prefecture temporarily and was recuperating from his illness while Taisuke ITAGAKI resigned his position as the result of political upheaval caused by Seikanron and organized Risshisha (Meiji Period) to start the Freedom and People's Rights Movement.

sen.j: 東京にいる佐々木の依頼を受けて原轍とともにその切り崩しにあたるとともに高知の反板垣勢力の結集にあたることになる。
sen.e: He and Tetsu HARA tried to undermine ITAGAKI's cause asked by SASAKI in Tokyo and, at the same time, organize the anti-ITAGAKI force in Kochi Prefecture.

sen.j: 前者は一定の成果を上げたものの、後者は結果的に旧佐幕派勢力の復権を招き、佐々木・斎藤も板垣と同類（新政府を作った裏切者）として糾弾されたために失敗に終わった。
